claims: The company is raising a $1.2M seed round.
The team grew to 36 members in 24 months.
Ctruh applications have over 1,600 active users.
The company has acquired 30 customers, including 9 enterprise clients.
The company holds 2 patents and intellectual properties.
Four products have been launched, including a 3D Engine and VersaAI.
Vinay Agastya is the Founder and CEO.
Website visitors grew 5.25% to over 59,000 in the last year.
Ctruh is part of accelerator programs by Microsoft, Google, and NVIDIA.
The company was a finalist in the LinkedIn Talent Awards 2023.
